vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for and an ordinance granting a Planned Development Subdistrict for MF-2 Multiple Family Subdistrict uses and an assisted living facility use on property zoned an MF-2 Multiple Family Subdistrict within Planned Development District No. 193, the Oak Lawn Special Purpose District, on the southeast line of Inwood Road, northeast of Lemmon Avenue
Recommendation of Staff:  Approval, subject to a development plan and conditions
Recommendation of CPC:  Approval, subject to a development plan and conditions
Z223-250(LG)
